thread.title: British Dressage chiefs ramp up 'dirty tricks' row over fallen Olympics golden girl Charlotte Dujardin's horse whipping video - as they say timing of leak was to cause 'maximum damage' to the sport and urge people to be 'kind' to her - UK news - NewsLocker
thread.title_full: British Dressage chiefs ramp up 'dirty tricks' row over fallen Olympics golden girl Charlotte Dujardin's horse whipping video - as they say timing of leak was to cause 'maximum damage' to the sport and urge people to be 'kind' to her - UK news - NewsLocker
